description: Israel rejects the UN chief's description of the war in Gaza as a "risk to international peace and security".
maintext: At the UN, the Americans duly vetoed this resolution calling for a ceasefire. For those concerned about the significant loss of life, that does sound a bit hollow - the Americans claim the Israelis are saying they will stick to the rules of war and avoid unnecessary civilian deaths. But, they say, there is a gap between what Israel says and what it does.
title: Bowen: US uses veto but pressure for Gaza ceasefire is building
